jd: Hello, My name is Arun Kushwaha and I am a Staffing Specialist at Sibitalent. I am reaching out to you on an exciting job opportunity with one of our clients. Job Title : SAP Project Manager Duration : 6+ Visa : USC,GC Location : Travel- 70-90 % weekly to Tulsa (mainly) - Location: Tulsa primarily – but travel to Longview TX outside of Dallas and Redmond Oregon once a month at most Job Description:They are looking for a Project Manager/Administrator with SAP knowledgeSomeone who has strong communication, attention to detail, and can communicate with the executives from the Client and Consulting Partner TeamsThis person will be the one documenting during the meetings, adhering to the team deadlines, follow up items, keeping the team to their tasks that they signed up for, holding people accountable in a professional manner, taking notes and action items and disturbing them to the team and making sure that commitments are being made or if not, communicating to Ken the intelThis role could end up managing Jr PMs on the project Self Starter, Independent, can work with multiple levels of people Thanks & RegardsSibitalentArun kushwah | Technical RecruiterDirect: +1 19363102127 -127E-Mail: arun.kushwaha@sibitalent.comWebsite: www.sibitalent.com Office: 101 E. Park Blvd., Suite 600, Plano, TX – 75074
